title: Cyclone-battered Mayotte to be put on red alert
description: PARIS (Reuters) - Authorities will put the French overseas territory of Mayotte on red alert late on Saturday, Overseas Minister Manuel Valls said, as a tropical storm nears the Indian Ocean archipelago that was devastated by a cyclone last month. Read full s…
content: PARIS (Reuters) - Authorities will put the French overseas territory of Mayotte on red alert late on Saturday, Overseas Minister Manuel Valls said, as a tropical storm nears the Indian Ocean archipel… [+1030 chars]
de: Das vom Zyklon heimgesuchte Mayotte wird in Alarmbereitschaft versetzt. PARIS (Reuters) – Die Behörden werden das französische Überseegebiet Mayotte am späten Samstag in Alarmbereitschaft versetzen, sagte Außenminister Manuel Valls, während sich ein tropischer Sturm dem Archipel im Indischen Ozean nähert, das letzten Monat von einem Zyklon verwüstet wurde. Lesen Sie die ganze s…
en: Cyclone-battered Mayotte to be put on red alert. PARIS (Reuters) - Authorities will put the French overseas territory of Mayotte on red alert late on Saturday, Overseas Minister Manuel Valls said, as a tropical storm nears the Indian Ocean archipelago that was devastated by a cyclone last month. Read full s…
la: Mayotte cyclone-quassata ut vigiles rubras induerent. PARIS (Reuters) - Auctoritates Gallicum transmarinum territorium Mayotte in rubris intentum sero die Sabbati ponent, Minister Transmarinus Manuel Valls dixit velut tempestas tropica prope Oceanum Indicum archipelago quae cyclone ultimo mense devastata est. title: France's Mayotte islands hit by tropical storm just weeks after devastating cyclone
description: The French territory of Mayotte is on red alert again with another cyclone heading toward the islands off Africa that were devastated by their worst storm in nearly a century last month
content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa -- The French territory of Mayotte was battered by a new tropical storm Sunday, just weeks after the worst cyclone to hit the islands in nearly a century laid waste to entire … [+4144 chars]
de: Die französischen Mayotte-Inseln wurden nur wenige Wochen nach dem verheerenden Wirbelsturm von einem Tropensturm heimgesucht. Das französische Territorium Mayotte ist erneut in Alarmbereitschaft, da ein weiterer Zyklon auf die Inseln vor Afrika zusteuert, die letzten Monat von ihrem schlimmsten Sturm seit fast einem Jahrhundert verwüstet wurden
en: France's Mayotte islands hit by tropical storm just weeks after devastating cyclone. The French territory of Mayotte is on red alert again with another cyclone heading toward the islands off Africa that were devastated by their worst storm in nearly a century last month
la: Franciae Mayottae insulae tropicae tempestate percussae proximae septimanae post cyclum vastatae sunt. Territorium Gallicum Mayotte in rubris rursus vigilat cum alio cyclone versus Africam versus insulas quae ultimo mense fere per saeculum tempestate pessima devastatae sunt.

title: Mayotte hit by new storm just weeks after devastating cyclone
description: A fresh tropical storm has struck Mayotte in the Indian Ocean just weeks after a deadly cyclone which killed at least 39 people and left more than 200 still missing.
content:
A fresh tropical storm has struck Mayotte in the Indian Ocean just weeks after a deadly cyclone which killed at least 39 people and left more than 200 still missing.
The archipelago, off the east co… [+3065 chars]
de: Nur wenige Wochen nach dem verheerenden Wirbelsturm wurde Mayotte von einem neuen Sturm heimgesucht. Ein neuer Tropensturm hat Mayotte im Indischen Ozean heimgesucht, nur wenige Wochen nach einem tödlichen Wirbelsturm, bei dem mindestens 39 Menschen ums Leben kamen und mehr als 200 noch vermisst wurden.
en: Mayotte hit by new storm just weeks after devastating cyclone. A fresh tropical storm has struck Mayotte in the Indian Ocean just weeks after a deadly cyclone which killed at least 39 people and left more than 200 still missing.
la: Mayotte nova tempestate percussa mox septimanas post cyclonem devastantem. Nova tempestas tropica Mayotte in Oceano Indico percussit sicut hebdomades post cyclonem funestum, qui saltem 39 homines occidit et plus quam 200 adhuc defuit.

title: BOM forecasting shows four potential cyclones could form off Australia
description: The Bureau of Meteorology is forecasting multiple cyclones could form across northern Australia by the end of the week, as tropical lows linger off the coast of north Queensland, in the Gulf of Carperntaria, and off the Kimberley in Western Australia.
content:
Multiple cyclones could potentially form across northern Australia by the end of this week and into next, in a late but mighty show of the monsoon, the Bureau of Meteorology has warned. 
It includes… [+5881 chars]
de: BOM-Prognosen zeigen, dass sich vor Australien vier potenzielle Wirbelstürme bilden könnten. Das Bureau of Meteorology prognostiziert, dass sich bis zum Ende der Woche mehrere Wirbelstürme in ganz Nordaustralien bilden könnten, da tropische Tiefststände vor der Küste von Nord-Queensland, im Golf von Carperntaria und vor Kimberley in Westaustralien anhalten.
en: BOM forecasting shows four potential cyclones could form off Australia. The Bureau of Meteorology is forecasting multiple cyclones could form across northern Australia by the end of the week, as tropical lows linger off the coast of north Queensland, in the Gulf of Carperntaria, and off the Kimberley in Western Australia.
la: BOM praevidens ostendit quattuor cyclones potentiales Australiam formare posse. Meteorologiae hendrerit multiplex cyclones praevidens per Australiam septentrionalem finem hebdomadis formare potuit, sicut mugitus tropicus moratur oram Reginae septentrionalis, in sinu Carperntariae, et Kimberley in Australia occidentali.

title: Extreme weather events put older adults at risk. Here's how they can prepare.
description: Over the past two decades, extreme weather events and record-breaking temperatures fueled by climate change have put more lives at risk. In the United States and around the world, hurricanes, tornadoes, floods, and heat waves have become more frequent, intens…
content: Over the past two decades, extreme weather events and record-breaking temperatures fueled by climate change have put more lives at risk. In the United States and around the world, hurricanes, tornado… [+7685 chars]
de: Extreme Wetterereignisse gefährden ältere Erwachsene. So können sie sich vorbereiten. In den letzten zwei Jahrzehnten haben extreme Wetterereignisse und rekordverdächtige Temperaturen, die durch den Klimawandel verursacht wurden, mehr Leben gefährdet. In den Vereinigten Staaten und auf der ganzen Welt sind Hurrikane, Tornados, Überschwemmungen und Hitzewellen häufiger und intensiver geworden.
en: Extreme weather events put older adults at risk. Here's how they can prepare.. Over the past two decades, extreme weather events and record-breaking temperatures fueled by climate change have put more lives at risk. In the United States and around the world, hurricanes, tornadoes, floods, and heat waves have become more frequent, intens…
la: Eventus tempestatis extremae maiores adultos in periculo posuit. Ecce quomodo praeparare possunt.. Praeteritis duobus decenniis, extremae tempestatis eventus et recordatio temperaturarum dissolutionum quae per mutationem climatis peractae sunt, plus vitae in periculo posuit. In Civitatibus Foederatis et circa orbem terrarum, procellae, turbines, inundationes et aestus fluctus frequentiores fiunt, intens…

title: Carbon Brief and The Guardian Falsely Claim Climate Change is Making Cyclones Worse
description: Multiple lines of evidence indicate that tropical cyclones are not getting worse due to the modest warming of the past hundred plus years, regardless of the reason for the warming. Carbon Brief and The Guardian misinform and do their readers a disservice when…
content:
From ClimateREALISM
By Linnea Lueken
Media outlets such as Carbon Brief and The Guardian recently ran articles claiming that climate change is making tropical cyclones worse shortly after cyclone C… [+4234 chars]
de: Carbon Brief und The Guardian behaupten fälschlicherweise, dass der Klimawandel Wirbelstürme verschlimmert. Mehrere Belege deuten darauf hin, dass sich tropische Wirbelstürme aufgrund der moderaten Erwärmung der letzten mehr als hundert Jahre nicht verschlimmern, unabhängig von der Ursache der Erwärmung. Carbon Brief und The Guardian informieren falsch und erweisen ihren Lesern keinen Gefallen, wenn …
en: Carbon Brief and The Guardian Falsely Claim Climate Change is Making Cyclones Worse. Multiple lines of evidence indicate that tropical cyclones are not getting worse due to the modest warming of the past hundred plus years, regardless of the reason for the warming. Carbon Brief and The Guardian misinform and do their readers a disservice when…
la: Carbon Brief et Custos Falsus Claim Clima Mutationem Cyclones deteriores facit. Plures testimoniorum lineae indicant cyclones tropicos non pejus esse propter modicam calefactionem ante centum plus annorum, quamcumque rationem calefactionis. Carbonis breve et  Custos detorquere et legentibus dissuationem facere, cum…

title: Climate science reality check: Data shows hurricanes are NOT increasing in frequency or power
description: A study published in Nature by Chinese meteorologists analyzed tropical cyclone activity over 30 years using the Power Dissipation Index (PDI), which measures storm intensity, duration, and frequency. The findings reveal no increase in cyclone destructiveness…
content: <ul><li>A study published in Nature by Chinese meteorologists analyzed tropical cyclone activity over 30 years using the Power Dissipation Index (PDI), which measures storm intensity, duration, and f… [+5746 chars]
de: Klimawissenschaftlicher Realitätscheck: Daten zeigen, dass Hurrikane NICHT an Häufigkeit oder Stärke zunehmen. Eine von chinesischen Meteorologen in „Nature“ veröffentlichte Studie analysierte die Aktivität tropischer Wirbelstürme über einen Zeitraum von 30 Jahren mithilfe des Power Dissipation Index (PDI), der Sturmintensität, -dauer und -häufigkeit misst. Die Ergebnisse zeigen keine Zunahme der Zerstörungskraft des Zyklons …
en: Climate science reality check: Data shows hurricanes are NOT increasing in frequency or power. A study published in Nature by Chinese meteorologists analyzed tropical cyclone activity over 30 years using the Power Dissipation Index (PDI), which measures storm intensity, duration, and frequency. The findings reveal no increase in cyclone destructiveness…
la: Scientiae climatis re vera perscriptio: Data spectaculorum turbinum frequentia vel potentia non augentur. Studium in Natura editum a meteorologis Sinensium actio cyclonis tropicae enucleata per 30 annos utens potentiae Dissipationis Index (PDI), quae intensionem, durationem et frequentiam tempestatis metitur. Inventiones nullum incrementum in cyclone destruc- tionis revelant...

title: Queensland heatwave eases ahead of possible tropical cyclones off coast
description: Queensland could get its first cyclones of this summer as several tropical lows develop in the state's north, while heatwave conditions have begun to ease in parts of the state.
content:
Queensland could be in for wild weather this week, with the chance several low pressure systems in the state's north could form into tropical cyclones.
Forecasters say heatwave conditions are beginn… [+3014 chars]
de: Die Hitzewelle in Queensland lässt vor möglichen tropischen Wirbelstürmen vor der Küste nach. In Queensland könnte es in diesem Sommer zu den ersten Wirbelstürmen kommen, da sich im Norden des Bundesstaates mehrere tropische Tiefstwerte entwickeln, während die Hitzewellenbedingungen in Teilen des Bundesstaates allmählich nachlassen.
en: Queensland heatwave eases ahead of possible tropical cyclones off coast. Queensland could get its first cyclones of this summer as several tropical lows develop in the state's north, while heatwave conditions have begun to ease in parts of the state.
la: Queensland heatwave eases before of cyclones tropical possibiles off coast. Reginae primas cyclones huius aestatis obtinere potuit ut plures in septentrione status tropici enucleantur, cum condiciones caloris in partibus civitatis lenire inceperunt.

title: I went on 50 cruises by the time I turned 30. I still think about 5 mistakes I made that future cruisers can easily avoid.
description: After 50 cruises, I still tell future travelers to avoid these mistakes, like sailing during hurricane season or flying in on the day the ship leaves.
content:
I hope future cruisers can try to avoid some of the travel mistakes I've made on my many cruises over the years. Allie Hubers
<ul><li>I've taken 50 cruises around the world by age 30, but my experie… [+5300 chars]
de: Als ich 30 wurde, habe ich 50 Kreuzfahrten gemacht. Ich denke immer noch an 5 Fehler, die ich gemacht habe und die zukünftige Kreuzfahrtschiffe leicht vermeiden können. Nach 50 Kreuzfahrten rate ich zukünftigen Reisenden immer noch, diese Fehler zu vermeiden, wie zum Beispiel das Segeln während der Hurrikansaison oder das Einfliegen am Tag der Abfahrt des Schiffes.
en: I went on 50 cruises by the time I turned 30. I still think about 5 mistakes I made that future cruisers can easily avoid.. After 50 cruises, I still tell future travelers to avoid these mistakes, like sailing during hurricane season or flying in on the day the ship leaves.
la: Ibam in 50 cruise per tempus conversus 30. Adhuc cogitare de 5 erroribus feci ut lembos futuros facile devitare possint.
